headline: Online Tip
subtitle: Non-Contact Sport
content:
Racing can once again be a gentleman’s sport with the introduction of the Non-Contact Racing option.

The host of any Race can change the Race Type to Non-Contact via the lobby options, which will enable players’ vehicles to pass through each other and disable slipstreaming.

You’ll need to watch out for general Los Santos commuters, whose vehicles can still put a dent in your bodywork.
